name: Sticky Crispy Orange Shrimp
description: Zoe Grandy really let's our Sticky Orange Chicken sauce shine with this recipe! Popcorn shrimp are bathed in a tangy 'n sweet sauce. Grab those napkins, because you won't be able to resist every sticky, crunchy bite!

ingredients.name: fresh veggies, such as broccoli, carrots, or cauliflower

preparation: Prepare popcorn shrimp according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in Multipurpose Steamer, add veggies. Cover; microwave on high until tender, 6–7 min.
In Sauté Pan, combine seasoning, orange juice, soy sauce, water, and cornstarch over medium heat. Stir until the sauce starts to thicken. Add Red Pepper Jelly, if desired.
Add cooked shrimp and veggies to pan; toss to coat.
Serve over rice with toppings, if desired.
tips: Make your own popcorn shrimp using Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix! Check out this recipe: Crispy Shrimp with Coleslaw.
Swap popcorn shrimp for popcorn chicken.
For a delish appetizer, omit the veggies—simply serve the shrimp tossed in the sauce and serve with toothpicks!

products.name: Sticky Orange Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: In less time than it takes to wait for takeout, you can have the best gluten free Sticky Orange Chicken ready to go! Just pair a few easy-to-shop-for ingredients with the blend, throw it in your wok (or frying pan) and you’ll have a kid-friendly, one-pot dinner on the table in less than 15 minutes.

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavor with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!
